text: Love Material UI, but don't need Material Design? Try Base UI, the new "unstyled" alternative. Read more in this announcement.

title: Unveiling Charts: Alpha release is live
text: We're starting with bars, lines, and scatter charts. Try X Charts now, and let us know what you need.

title: MUI X v6.18.x and the latest improvements before the next major
text: New stable components, polished features, better performance and more. Check out the details in our recent blog post.
